<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> getRegionDuplicationCount(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Region &#42;R) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find out how many times region R is cloned. Note that if the parent</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of R is cloned, R is also cloned, but R&#39;s clone count is not updated</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from the clone of the parent. We need to accumlate all the counts</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from the ancestors to get the clone count.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (R) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> += DuplicationCount&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>-&gt;getParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Recursively traverse the use-def chains of the given value and return a set</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of the unhoistable base values defined within the scope (excluding the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// first-region entry block) or the (hoistable or unhoistable) base values that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are defined outside (including the first-region entry block) of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// scope. The returned set doesn&#39;t include constants.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::set&lt;Value &#42;&gt; &amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;, std::set&lt;Value &#42;&gt;&gt; &amp;Visited) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It = Visited.find(V);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (It != Visited.end()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It-&gt;second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::set&lt;Value &#42;&gt; Result;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(V)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We don&#39;t stop at a block that&#39;s not in the Scope because we would miss</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Constructs the true and false branch probabilities if the the instruction has</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// valid branch weights. Returns true when this was successful, false otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579" lineLink="#afb9349865f6045be3029d7d171f23f4e"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#afb9349865f6045be3029d7d171f23f4e">extractBranchProbabilities</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t SumWeight = TrueWeight + FalseWeight;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SumWeight &gt;= TrueWeight &amp;&amp; SumWeight &gt;= FalseWeight &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Overflow calculating branch probabilities.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Guard against 0-to-0 branch weights to avoid a division-by-zero crash.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SumWeight == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check that any of the branch and the selects in the region could be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// hoisted above the the CHR branch insert point (the most dominating of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// them, either the branch (at the end of the first block) or the first</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// select in the first block). If the branch can&#39;t be hoisted, drop the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// selects in the first blocks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For example, for the following scope/region with selects, we want to insert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the merged branch right before the first select in the first/entry block by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// hoisting c1, c2, c3, and c4.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// // Branch insert point here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a = c1 ? b : c; // Select 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// d = c2 ? e : f; // Select 2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// if (c3) &#123; // Branch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   c4 = foo() // A call.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   g = c4 ? h : i; // Select 3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// But suppose we can&#39;t hoist c4 because it&#39;s dependent on the preceding</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// call. Then, we drop Select 3 Furthermore, if we can&#39;t hoist c2, we also drop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Select 2 If we can&#39;t hoist c3, we drop Selects 1 &amp; 2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Determine whether to split a scope depending on the sets of the branch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// condition values of the previous region and the current region. We split</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (return true) it if 1) the condition values of the inner/lower scope can&#39;t be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// hoisted up to the outer/upper scope, or 2) the two sets of the condition</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// values have an empty intersection (because the combined branch conditions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// won&#39;t probably lead to a simpler combined condition).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042" lineLink="#a4bd77853df82f4643859aa72ec33b2c0"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a4bd77853df82f4643859aa72ec33b2c0">shouldSplit</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">InsertPoint</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1715"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// entry block of the first region. The old entry block becomes the block to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1716"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// insert the CHR branch into. Note DT gets updated. Since DT gets updated</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1717"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// through the split, we update the entry of the first region after the split,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1718"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and Region only points to the entry and the exit blocks, rather than</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1719"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// keeping everything in a list or set, the blocks membership and the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1720"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// entry/exit blocks of the region are still valid after the split.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2016"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// branches/selects of the inner/lower scope can&#39;t be hoisted up to the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2018"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// branches/selects in a scope (including subscopes) don&#39;t share at least</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2019"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// one common value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2020"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;CHRScope &#42;, 8&gt;</a> SplitScopes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2021"><Highlight kind="normal">    splitScopes(AllScopes, SplitScopes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2022"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="#a845d59a9cee6653b5c607b317afae153">CHR&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="#ae1b005e1a73fa20d7b1edcdae3e40961">dumpScopes</a>(SplitScopes, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Split scopes&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2023"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2024"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// After splitting, set the biased regions and selects of a scope (a tree</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2026"><Highlight kind="normal">    classifyBiasedScopes(SplitScopes);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2028"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
